description: ff. 88. 208 x 150; 154 x 84 mm. 23 lin. Rajab 1076. A number of leaves by a later hand. The title page (by a later hand) attributes this work to Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Bakrī al-Ṣiddīqī (d. 994/1586), but according to Baghdādī, Īḍāḥ al-maknūn, I, 249 the author is Ibn ḥajar al-Haythamī, d. 973/1565. Divided into muqaddimah, four bābs, and khātimah. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى طىب طىبة ... وبعد فانه لما کانت الزىارة
author: Bakrī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1524-1586
title: Tuḥfat al-zuwwār ilá qabr al-Nabī al-mukhtār.
creator: Bakrī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1524-1586
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Tomb—Visitation—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
